content.rendered:
Not sure why or who came up with this idea but it was a good excuse for some expert craft and a party.

After some extravagant online purchases, everyone was kitted out with Sombrero and Moustaches and a Piñata to be proud of was hung from the ceiling in the bar (it really was an excellent piece of craft and such a shame to shame it to pieces).

We added a couple of inflatable Cacti and along with the Piñata, we constructed a photo frame for the photo along with a huge “Pin the Tail on the Donkey” – definitely lots of cheating with that game!

All the tables were lined up in a row, adorned with Mexican flags and our fantastic Chef served up a Mexican supper to be proud of.

excerpt.rendered: After some extravagant online purchases, everyone was kitted out with Sombrero and Moustaches and a Piñata to be proud of was hung from the ceiling in the bar (it really was an excellent piece of craft and such a shame to shame it to pieces)…
